name: Scared 2 Be Lonely
lyrics:
Too many lonely days, too many solo nights
太多的孤单时日，太多夜晚独自度过
I'll be back in your arms at midnight
在午夜我还会重回你的怀抱
Hold me 'cause I'm scared to be lonely
抱紧我因为我是那么害怕孤独
solo nights
孤独的夜晚
just believe me
相信我就好
Too many lonely days, too many solo nights
太多的孤单时日，太多夜晚独自度过
I'll be back in your arms at midnight
在午夜我还会重回你的怀抱
Hold me 'cause I'm scared to be lonely
抱紧我因为我是那么害怕孤独
too many heartaches and i'm done just believe me
太多的心痛，我受够了，相信我
and now break down'cause you said it'd be easy
现在分手吧，因为你说过这很容易
Too many lonely days, too many solo nights
太多的孤单时日，太多夜晚独自度过
I'll be back in your arms at midnight
在午夜我还会重回你的怀抱
Hold me 'cause I'm scared to be lonely
抱紧我因为我是那么害怕孤独
solo nights
孤独的夜晚
just believe me
相信我就好
Too many lonely days, too many solo nights
太多的孤单时日，太多夜晚独自度过
I'll be back in your arms at midnight
在午夜我还会重回你的怀抱
Hold me 'cause I'm scared to be lonely
抱紧我因为我是那么害怕孤独
many lonely days, too many solo nights
太多的孤单时日，太多夜晚独自度过
I'll be back in your arms at midnight
在午夜我还会重回你的怀抱
Hold me 'cause I'm scared to be lonely
抱紧我因为我是那么害怕孤独
收起
